Posts.Content: Feb 17, 2013 12:20PM GreenCowgirl wrote: RAcy  Hi  Yes I thought i was just being a weenie or something but my radiated breast is extra tender still, hurts more during pms week and is sore underneath at the ribs.  I also get extra tight in the pectoral muscle and stretch it daily.  I work out, do yoga and am very active with kids and horses.  I see your pretty horse in the pic, what type of riding do you do?  I have just had dx of new dcisin same breast and am having a BMX to get this cancer out of my life.  I am very worries about not having any horse time for several month during recovery!  My horses were my best defense after the first round of radiation/sadness.  I had my two horses plus a sweet older paint rescue horse i was working on at the time. They helped me soo much, we saved each other i think. Nancy
Posts.Title: sore/tender breast to touch 19 months after rads Racy GreenCowgirl
